about_the_game:
Prince Rystiya's Starfleet is a free 2D space RTS. It's a student project made by a student from SMU Guildhall.

Commander, the Lizardfolk Empire is pushing forward, and our new Lizardfolk followers are under threat. The Rystaurian Church shall not abandon its believers, no matter their past or status. However, our Lizardfolk followers are outnumbered and outgunned, and no other militaries can provide help. You are our only hope, commander.

--Prince Rystiya's Starfleet has 4 game modes, including a galactic conquest mode (inspired by classics like Total Wars and Star Wars: Empire at War) and a skirmish mode (inspired by classics like Command and Conquer and Homeworld). If you just want a quick match, then challenge levels and custom mode are made for you.

--There are more than 15 units, each having unique strengths and weaknesses. This game is optimized to support 1000+ units fighting on the screen at the same time.

--The game's combat system is inspired by real-world naval combat. There's no armor type. Instead, each unit has an armor value. Low-damage projectiles will struggle to overcome the target's armor, while most high-damage projectiles can be intercepted by rapid-fire weapons.

Prince Rystiya's Starfleet is a free 2D space RTS. It's a student project made by a student from SMU Guildhall.

Commander, the Lizardfolk Empire is pushing forward, and our new Lizardfolk followers are under threat. The Rystaurian Church shall not abandon its believers, no matter their past or status. However, our Lizardfolk followers are outnumbered and outgunned, and no other militaries can provide help. You are our only hope, commander.

--Prince Rystiya's Starfleet has 4 game modes, including a galactic conquest mode (inspired by classics like Total Wars and Star Wars: Empire at War) and a skirmish mode (inspired by classics like Command and Conquer and Homeworld). If you just want a quick match, then challenge levels and custom mode are made for you.

--There are more than 15 units, each having unique strengths and weaknesses. This game is optimized to support 1000+ units fighting on the screen at the same time.

--The game's combat system is inspired by real-world naval combat. There's no armor type. Instead, each unit has an armor value. Low-damage projectiles will struggle to overcome the target's armor, while most high-damage projectiles can be intercepted by rapid-fire weapons.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Memory: 2000 MB RAM
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 100 MB available space

short_description: Conquer the entire galaxy or fight quick custom battles in this free space RTS!
